title: DAILY DIVIDEND | Sat, 23 Jan
html:
Intel extends losses with a 17% drop, USA Canada tensions rise, storm engulfs the US

S&P +0.03% | Gold +0.95% | Bitcoin +0.03% | VIX +0.83%

Trump withdrew Canadaâ€™s invitation to join his proposed â€œBoard of Peace,â€ signalling political tension but also easing fears of any near-term military confrontation. Markets saw this as de-escalation rather than escalation.

ğŸ” STOCK SPOTLIGHT


Intel (Semiconductors) -17.0%
Intel had its worst day in months after weak guidance and supply concerns overshadowed solid earnings, raising doubts about its turnaround story.

Adani Enterprises (Indian Conglomerate) -10.65%
Shares plunged as U.S. regulators moved closer to questioning Gautam Adani over fraud and bribery allegations, reigniting governance fears.

Delta Airlines (Travel) -1.46%
Delta slipped as a major winter storm forced widespread flight cancellations, hitting airline operations and near-term demand. US airline stocks experienced a wider sell-off.
